data.title: Detroit Pistons Governor, CEO Platinum Equity
data.meta_description: Tom Gores is the chairman and CEO of global M&A&OÂ® firm Platinum Equity, Goverrnor of the NBA's Detroit Pistons and founder of FlintNOW.
data.text: Chairman and CEO Tom Gores founded Platinum Equity in 1995 and now ranks on Forbes lists of both the "World's Billionaires" and "Richest Americans." His leadership of Platinum Equity, growing it to be among the largest private companies in America today, is based on the principles of relationships, trust, and communication.
